column3: Operator prefixing<ref name="prefix">Operator prefixing: The ability for network staff (not channel ops  but ircd opers) to be denoted in a channel with a special prefix.</ref>
column5: Operator "levels"<ref name="levels">Operator "levels": protect "higher" opers from being killed and/or z  k  or g-lined by "lower" opers</ref>

column3: <ref name="ngircd-commit">"Handle channel user modes 'a'  'h'  and 'q' from remote servers". GitHub.</ref>
